short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables you to enhance your chatGPT experience and stay on top of your chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏦 Organize Your Conversations Efficiently

Looking for an easy way to manage and quickly access your conversations? Our Chrome extension is designed to help you stay organized and save time with just a few clicks.

📋 Key Features

🔎 Quick Search: Find your conversations instantly with our powerful search tool.

📁 Folder Management: Create folders and categorize your conversations to keep your workspace neat and accessible.

🔒 Pinned Conversations: Pin your important conversations for easy access at any time, without the need to scroll endlessly.

🚀 Seamless Integration: Works seamlessly with your existing workflow, saving you time and effort by making your conversations easy to find and manage.

🚪 Why You'll Love It

#1 Save Time: No more scrolling through countless chats. Everything is just one click away.
#2 Get Organized: Structure your conversations the way you want, so you stay productive.
#3 Stay Focused: Keep only relevant conversations in sight by using smart filtering and categorization.

⚡ Add this extension today to take control of your conversations, stay organized, and elevate your productivity!
